attributes.action: Open the schools now for our children.
attributes.additional_details:
Our kids mental health is our priority.
Mental health in children and teens has sky rocketed in this last year.
We know there is a strong correlation between the children being home-schooled and poor mental health issues.
Our children and teens right now are extremely vulnerable.
We cannot just let this continue.
Good mental health should be the primary focus for our children and our community right now.
Schools need to open . They need to open now.
attributes.background:
Our children need a routine and structure for their well being.
They need social interactions and a real chance in developing their academic skills.
They cannot be the collateral damage in this fight against coronavirus.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552187
